data.name: IAgreeToTC
data.value: I AGREE TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral1
data.value: If your benefit plan includes Online Claims Submission, this App will provide a feature for submitting claims. When you submit claims using the GSC Mobile App Online Claim Submission feature, you agree to the following: "I agree that all information provided using Online claim submission will be complete and accurate. In the event that my information is found to be incomplete or inaccurate, I understand that GSC reserves the right to remove my online claiming privileges. I understand that the information, including the personal information, that I provide to Green Shield Canada about myself and my dependents, will be used by GSC for claims adjudication and any other services necessary in the administration of my benefits which may include the exchange of information with other parties to administer this benefit plan.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral2
data.value: I am authorized by my spouse and/or dependents to disclose and receive information about them that is used for these purposes. My spouse and/or dependents understand that this information may be seen by me, the cardholder and used by GSC and the other parties referenced in this agreement for the purposes set out in this agreement.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral3
data.value: When submitting claims online, GSC may select my claim for audit. If so requested, I am responsible for producing the original receipt(s) within 30 days.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral4
data.value: If I fail to provide the receipt(s) to GSC, or provide false, incomplete, or misleading information, GSC reserves the right to classify my claim as an overpayment and will deduct such monies from any future claim payments. Furthermore, my coverage may be denied or terminated and/or online submission may be revoked.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral5
data.value: I understand and agree that I am responsible for retaining original receipt(s) for 13 months following the date of my claim submission(s).

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral6
data.value: GSC maintains a national database of providers and their association with any regulatory agency, professional association or educational program. GSC reviews each provider to determine which benefits/services are eligible for reimbursement in conjunction with the plan member’s health benefits plan. When submitting a claim online, with a provider that has not registered with GSC, the provider’s credentials will be verified and my claim will be processed accordingly.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsGeneral7
data.value: Acceptance of the Online Claim Submission Agreement Terms and Conditions applies to all claims submitted within an online session. If I submit multiple claims (for a different dependent and/or provider) within the online session, my acceptance of the Online Claim Submission Agreement Terms and Conditions applies to all those claims submitted."

data.name: GeneralContent6
data.value: https://clac.ca/GSC4myCLAC

data.name: GeneralContent8
data.value: click here

data.name: MyIdCardText
data.value: MY ID CARD

data.name: claimConfirm_description
data.value: The above information will be submitted to Green Shield Canada. Please ensure the information is correct before proceeding. If you need to change the information, please click the back button to return to the claim submission form. Otherwise click the Submit button to submit the claim to Green Shield Canada.

data.name: claimConfirm_id_number
data.value: Green Shield ID Number

data.name: DisclaimerFirstParagraph
data.value: I agree that all information provided using this online claim submission application is complete and accurate. In the event that my information is found to be incomplete or inaccurate, I understand that Green Shield Canada reserves the right to remove my online claiming privileges. I understand that the information, including the personal information, that I provide to Green Shield Canada about myself and my dependents, will be used by Green Shield Canada for claims adjudication and any other services necessary in the administration of my benefits which may include the exchange of information with other parties to administer my benefit plan.

data.name: DisclaimerSecondParagraph
data.value: I am authorized by my spouse and/or dependents to disclose and receive information about them that is used for these purposes. My spouse and/or dependents understand that this information may be seen by me, the cardholder and used by Green Shield Canada and the other parties referenced in this agreement for the purposes set out in this agreement.

data.name: AuditDisclaimerFirstParagraph
data.value: As the plan member, I am authorized by my spouse and/or dependents to disclose and receive information about them that is used for these purposes. They understand that this information may be seen by me.

data.name: AuditDisclaimerSecondParagraph
data.value: By submitting actual receipts, I agree that the information provided is complete and accurate. I understand that the information I provide to GSC about myself and my dependents will be used by GSC for claims adjudication and any other services necessary in the administration of our benefits which may include the exchange of information with other parties to administer this benefit claim.

data.name: AuditDisclaimerThirdParagraph
data.value: I further authorize GSC to obtain and exchange information with other parties, such as health practitioners or insurers, to confirm the accuracy of the submitted claims(s) information. In the event of suspected fraudulent activity pertaining to claims submitted on behalf of myself and/or my dependents, I acknowledge and agree to the disclosure of this information to relevant parties, such as a plan sponsor and regulatory and law enforcement agencies.

data.name: NoActiveClaimsLabel
data.value: Good news. You have no claims requiring additional information.

data.name: VisionEnhancementsMessage
data.value: The See better to succeed program offers a $250 reimbursement per 24-month period for purchases of glasses or contact lenses prescribed by a professional to correct the vision of any child under 18 years of age. Only purchases made after September 1, 2019 from an optician or optometrist in Québec are eligible. You must submit your claim even if the amount offered by the government covers the total purchase amount.

data.name: VisionEnhancementsProgramName
data.value: See better to succeed

data.name: VisionEnhancementsProgramAdditionalInfo
data.value: You must submit your claim even if the amount offered by the government covers the total purchase amount.

data.name: ClaimDetailsOtherBenefitsTitle
data.value: Do you have coverage under another benefits plan?

data.name: DirectDepositEFTAlert
data.value: To use our claim submission feature, you must be registered for direct deposit for your claim payments – log into Plan Member Online Services and click on Direct Deposit to register. Alternatively, you can complete a paper claim and mail it to us.

data.name: DirectDepositOptInMessage
data.value: I authorize GSC to deposit funds directly into the bank account noted below. I understand that I will no longer receive statements from GSC in the mail as my statements will only be available online.

data.name: DDConfirmAuthoriseDepositFundLabel
data.value: I acknowledge that it is my responsibility to ensure the accuracy of my banking details and that GSC accepts no responsibility and cannot be held liable if any information provided is incorrect, incomplete, or inaccurate.

data.name: DDResultDisclaimer3
data.value: In addition, I acknowledge that GSC is not responsible for any damage, claim, or cause of action, of any nature whatsoever, that may result from any direct deposit made using this bank account information or that may arise from the provision of incorrect, incomplete, or inaccurate bank account information. Therefore, I hold the insurer and the carrier harmless of any responsibility in this regard.
